descriptor: J and C are waiting for Pb w her grandmother's taxi
Pb picks them up in front of the cafe and C doesn't feel safe
R asks M to reassure him about what Ra told him as faults
Ra comes out of her bedroom and asks for the heating to be turned down + R breaks the radiator
Pb arrives in front of her "father" and motivates herself to get out of the car
the guests have arrived at Ra and M's and they are all very hot
Ra opens the door to other guests
the janitor joins the party and R tries to bribe him to fix the radiator
Mr Treeger approaches Ra to kiss her under the mistletoe
Pb returns to the car to tell J and C how her meeting w her “father” went
M, Ra and R splash each other w water
J succeeded in lowering the temperature of the radiator
the guys do the gift exchange !
